8814238.name: Devil's Passage - Butterfly Valley 1 - CroWay
8814238.fixme: If something goes wrong you should contact renting company - PINS. +385 98 55 128
8814238.description: Beautiful 45 kilometers route through the heart and soul of mountain Croatia. The roads are quite empty and you can enjoy in your ride, especially with an E-Bike which you can rent it in a destination (Zeleni vir).

14649730.name: Epario
14649730.description: Epario je za pješake i bicikliste. Osim dionice duge 1 km, koja je pogodna za MTB, staza nije zahtjevna ni za biciklizam ni za pješačenje. Dijelovi rute su otvoreni za automobile Pažnja!
14649730.description:de: Der Epario ist für Fußgänger u. Radfahrer. Bis auf einen ca. 1 km langen Wegabschnitt, der für MTB geeignet ist, ist der Weg weder zum Radfahren noch zum Gehen anspruchsvoll. Teile der Strecke sind für Autos freigegeben Achtung!
14649730.description:en: The Epario is for pedestrians and cyclists. Except for a 1 km long section, which is suitable for MTB, the path is not difficult for cycling or walking. Parts of the route are open to cars Attention!
